original_title: Los Reyes: la verdadera historia del Búster y el Camaleón
overview: Inspired on the true story of drug lord José Figueroa Agosto, commonly known as Junior Cápsula. A Puerto Rican drug convict escapes from jail and flees to Santo Domingo, where he continues his drug business and meets a woman who becomes his lover.
title: Los Reyes: la verdadera historia del Búster y el Camaleón
